title: 163: Productivity Hacks for the Female Brain with Alisa Vitti
description:
Today's episode is another special segment for women and women in your life. 

Alisa Vitti, a functional nutritionist, hormone expert, a best-selling author of The WomanCode System, and her new book, In the FLO, joins us again today. She coaches women around the world and brings her experience and expertise of healing women's hormone issues to share with you how you can learn to utilize your cycle to change your energy level and become healthier and productive. 

In this episode, Alisa will explain a new method of project mapping for women, and how you can leverage your hormones to get more done. She will tell you about the type of work that best matches each hormonal cycle, and how you can work with your patterns to deal with the external demands on your time with more happiness and less stress.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
